page.title: 15Places of Interest.
page.content: Last Tuesday we went to Aykley Heads Police Headquarters it was a very interesting visit. At l.3O p.m. we got on Mr Rayners bus and we arrived at Aykley Heads at l.45 p.m. We had to wait for P.C. Kinghorn to show us around. First we went to the control centre where they take messages and send policeman to different places. There is a large map of the motorway in Co. Durham which shows where cars have broken down. There are also six computers. Next we went to see the police cars and motor bikes, they use Ford Grenadas, Rover, Honda motor- cycles and Triumph Bonnevilles. Then we went to the museum to see the old police uniforms, also there were bits of skulls and things from murders. After this we waited for the bus and got back to school at 4.3O p.m.
